headline: Is Huntington Bancshares (HBAN) Pricing Look Compelling After Regional Bank Sector Reassessment?
summary: If you are wondering whether Huntington Bancshares is attractively priced or starting to look stretched, this breakdown is designed to help you frame that question clearly. The share price closed at US$17.47 recently, with returns of a 5.9% decline over 7 days, a 3.1% decline over 30 days, close to flat at a 0.1% decline year to date, and gains of 7.4% over 1 year, 33.3% over 3 years, and 38.7% over 5 years. Recent news around U.S. regional banks, including Huntington, has focused on how...
